name: Dracoray
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Dracoray you can return
up to {solar}{solar}{solar} from your Underworld to your
Spirit Deck. During your Draw Phase you
can Expend {fire} in order to Special Ascend
this Dracoray to Dragallus from your deck.
effect: When you Cast this Dracoray you can return up to {solar}{solar}{solar} from your Underworld to your Spirit Deck. During your Draw Phase you can Expend {fire} in order to Special Ascend this Dracoray to Dragallus from your deck.
